channel.title: Need help with smf
channel.description:
ok im not shure if its okay to post here.
tell me if i need to remove.
ok well i go to my acp and enable Home
but how can i post stuff there ?? i want to have a xat chatbox there.
i have the code for the xat. but i dont now how to post on the Home page on the forum
and i wonder when im having a vps do i have to have a static ip adress ??
and srry for my shty english :S

item.title: Need help with smf
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Well, just edit index.php and add your code? Or install simpleportal and add it to a block?

Also,

1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, 'coder'/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.

Read full topic
